org.bamja.core.impl
Class InstanceManager.DependencyManager

java.lang.Object
  org.bamja.core.impl.InstanceManager.DependencyManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Dependency
Enclosing class:
InstanceManager
final class InstanceManager.DependencyManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Dependency

The DependencyManager task is to listen to service events and to call the bind/unbind methods on a given object. It is also responsible for requesting the unregistration of a service in case a dependency is broken.

serviceChanged

public void serviceChanged(ServiceEvent evt)
Called upon a service event. This method is responsible for calling the binding and unbinding methods and also to request the eventual unregistering of a service when a dependency breaks

Parameters:
evt - The ServiceEvent

public boolean isValid()
Test if this dependency managed by this object is valid

Specified by:
isValid in interface Dependency

getRequiredServiceRefs

private ServiceReference[] getRequiredServiceRefs()
Returns an array containing the service references that are pertinent to the dependency managed by this object. This method filters out services that belong to bundles that are being (or are actually) shutdown. This is an issue since is not clearly specified in the OSGi specification if a getServiceReference call should return the services that belong to bundles that are stopping.

Returns:
an array of ServiceReferences valid in the context of this dependency

getTargetMethod

private java.lang.reflect.Method getTargetMethod(java.lang.String methodname,
                                                 java.lang.Class targetClass,
                                                 java.lang.Class paramClass)
                                          throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
Gets a target method based on a set of parameters

Parameters:
methodname - The name of the method
targetClass - the class to which the method belongs to
paramClass - the class of the parameter that is passed to the method
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the class was not found
java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if the method was not found

callBindMethod

private boolean callBindMethod(ServiceReference ref)
Call the bind method. In case there is an exception while calling the bind method, the service is not considered to be bound to the instance object

Parameters:
ref - A ServiceReference with the service that will be bound to the instance object
Returns:
true if the call was successful, false otherwise

callUnbindMethod

private void callUnbindMethod(ServiceReference ref)
Call the unbind method

Parameters:
ref - A service reference corresponding to the service that will be unbound
